DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare therapeutic effect acupuncture use traditional acupoints Ashi point myofascial trigger point superficial dry needling acupressure , follow postisometric stretch appropriate muscle , treatment patient chronic mechanical low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Traditional Acupuncture Myofascial Trigger Point Dry Needling Acupressure Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis mechanical low back pain least three month . The chronic mechanical lower back pain chief complaint , without leg pain . The low back pain disabling degree affect patient 's routine job and/or lifestyle . Patients tumor , infection , major trauma spine cause fracture disruption major ligament , cauda equina syndrome . Patients neurological sign spinal nerve compression . Patients undergone spinal surgery , facet joint block and/or corticoid injection . Patients general contraindication acupuncture acupressure treatment .
